The size is fixed, and does not scale with the drawing.

The hit-test is done on the entire text extent

.. class:: Text(TextObjectMixin, DrawObject)

   Draws a text object
   
   The size is fixed, and does not scale with the drawing.
   
   The hit-test is done on the entire text extent
